Tired of MP3's? Want Better Quality?
Download this Soundtrack in FLAC!
http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/5689674/Inception_OST_-_Hans_Zimmer_-_FLAC#filelistContainer

FLAC stands for Free Loss-less Audio Codec and is one of the most efficient Loss-less Codec's out there.
A FLAC encode can reduce file size by over 40% and maintain ALL THE QUALITY of the original CD's WAVE :)
A program like Toast can burn these files to a disc giving you a perfect CD QUALITY BURN.
A program like Audacity can quickly convert these files to .wav for playing on a PC or .aif for playing on a MAC!
You deserve better audio quality! Once you go FLAC you never go back!
Oh, and a program like VLC Media Player can playback FLAC files directly!
